Instruction: Rinse the quinoa under cold water.
In a saucepan, bring water to a boil. Add quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes, or until quinoa is cooked and water is absorbed.
Fluff the quinoa with a fork and transfer it to a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the quinoa and toss to coat.
Dice the cucumber, halve the cherry tomatoes, and thinly slice the red onion.
Add the diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, sliced red onion, and chopped fresh parsley to the quinoa. Toss gently to combine.
Serve the lemon quinoa salad at room temperature or chilled as a refreshing and nutritious side dish.
